availability.restrictions: Classes (Masters in Business Administration) on Tuesdays and Thursdays

careerProfile.summary: Six-year work experience at the Department of Environment and Natural Resources (DENR), Republic of the Philippines, as Front Desk Officer in the Hostel Building under the General Services Division.
careerProfile.keyFocus: Customer service and client satisfaction with expertise in hostel management and administrative operations
careerProfile.careerObjective: Passionate about achieving the highest level of success in customer service and related functions

administrative.description: Ability to focus on minute details and ensure accuracy in data-entry, record keeping and administrative tasks

organizational.description: Exemplary planning, organisation and time management skills with capacity to efficiently manage competing tasks and deadlines

relationshipManagement.description: Excellent interpersonal and customer service skills with proven ability to establish and maintain productive working relationships

communication.description: Demonstrated ability to convey information in clear and easily understood manner, both verbally and in written form

employmentHistory.employer: Villagio Ashfield, West Ashfield Leagues Club
keyResponsibilities: Greet patrons and members with friendly and professional demeanor
Deliver food promptly and efficiently following proper service etiquette
Monitor tables, clear plates and glasses, maintain dining area tidiness
Set and arrange tables with appropriate cutlery, crockery, glassware, condiments
Perform closing duties including table resetting and area cleaning
Execute additional tasks as directed by supervisor

employmentHistory.employer: Department of Environment and Natural Resources (DENR)
keyResponsibilities: Perform administrative and technical tasks including daily room monitoring
Handle hostel disinfection and air conditioning usage
Document and file guest records and reservations
Report and inspect repairs as needed
Assist in preparation of weekly, monthly and narrative reports
Answer hostel direct phone calls and inquiries
Process guest reservations
Record check-in and check-out of guests
Prepare folio and receive payment
Create hostel monthly/weekly reports with guest statistics
Update daily hostel manifest and database
Deliver optimal customer service and manage guest enquiries
Greet and welcome guests to provide home-like experience

employmentHistory.employer: Department of Environment and Natural Resources (DENR)
keyResponsibilities: Maintain accurate records and databases
Encode data into computer programs
Compile reports and organize files
Receive and forward documents within the Agency
Deliver and remit hostel daily collection to cashier and accounting office
Deliver optimal customer service levels
Manage guest enquiries and resolve concerns

trainingAndCertifications.title: Aircraft Maintenance Technician (Apprentice)
trainingAndCertifications.provider: Philippine National Police - Special Action Force Air Unit
keyCompetencies: Troubleshooting aircraft systems, engines and avionics

trainingAndCertifications.title: Essential Electronics for Aviation
trainingAndCertifications.focus: Aviation industry technology and electronics for safe and efficient operations

careerTransition.careerPath: Transition from operational hospitality roles to strategic business management
